titleStmt.title: Nocturnall lucubrations: or Meditations divine and morall Whereunto are added epigrams and epitaphs: written by Rob: Chamberlain of Exeter Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Daniel Frere, at the signe of the Red Bull in Little-Brittaine,

notesStmt.note: "Epigrams and epitaphs", in verse, has separate divisional title page and is unpaginated; register is continuous.
Variant: title page lacks "of Exeter Colledge in Oxford".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
